system.description: You have learned the healing ways of nature and the land, and how they can be twisted with malicious intent. You are a healer, a druggist, or an apothecary.
system.basic: You can concoct healing elixirs and salves from herbs and plants, which give you a +1 bonus to DOCTORIN’ tests.
system.advanced: There is little you do not know about the healing powers and dangers of nature. You gain a +2 bonus to DOCTORIN’ when working against poison, venom or sickness, and can create poisons with a Potency of 2.
